code: library(stglpyhs)  grouped <- stations |>   group_by(month, name, long, lat) |>   summarise(     avgmin = mean(tmin, na.rm = TRUE),     avgmax = mean(tmax, na.rm = TRUE) ) #TODO: Accommodate for xend aesthetic (required in geom_segment) ggplot(data = grouped) +   geom_sf(data = mainland_us, color = "white") +   ggthemes::theme_map() +   geom_point(aes(x = long, y = lat)) +   geom_segment_glyph(aes(     x_major = long,      y_major = lat,      x_minor = month,      y_minor = avgmin,      yend_minor = avgmax)     )
